name: Ideogram Character Remix Image Editor Kie AI
description:
Remixes an input image with a specific character reference and text prompt using the Ideogram character remix model, via the kie.ai API. Generates up to 4 images at once.
Pricing (as of November 2025): per image,  $0.06 for Turbo, $0.09 for Balanced, $0.12 for Quality.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

prompt.description: The text prompt describing how to edit the image. Max length : 5000 characters.

negative_prompt.description: Optional negative prompt to avoid in image editing. Max length : 500 characters. Defaults to None (omit if not provided)

character_reference_image_path.description: Required local full path to the character reference image. Accepted types: .jpeg, .png, and .webp. Max size : 10MB

image_size.description: Optional size of the created image(s). Must be one of 'square', 'square_hd', 'portrait_4_3', 'portrait_16_9', 'landscape_4_3', 'landscape_16_9'. Defaults to 'square_hd'

remix_image_path.description: Required local full path to the image to remix. Accepted types: .jpeg, .png, and .webp. Max size : 10MB

seed.description: Optional seed (integer) for reproducible generation. Defaults to None, a random seed is chosen.

style.description: Optional style type to generate with. Must be one of 'AUTO', 'GENERAL', 'REALISTIC', 'DESIGN'. Defaults to 'AUTO'

num_images.description: Optional number of images to generate. Must be 1-4. Defaults to 1

strength.description: Optional strength of the input image in the remix. Min 0.1, max 1.0. Defaults to 0.8

rendering_speed.description: Optional rendering speed to use. Must be one of 'TURBO', 'BALANCED', 'QUALITY'. Defaults to 'BALANCED'

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created image(s) (without extension); defaults to None (uses task_id)

expand_prompt.description: Wether to enable automated prompt improvement (may increase processing time). Defaults to False

saved_images_paths.description: List of local paths where images are saved

status.description: Status of the operation (success, error, etc.)

task_id.description: The ID of the generated task

temporary_image_urls.description: List of temporary URLs for generated images
